content: I think that's a great idea! Offering a discount for pre-orders will definitely create a sense of urgency and encourage customers to buy sooner rather than later. I was thinking, since I participated in the Community Yard Sale on April 17th and had a great experience, I could also offer a special promotion to customers who share a photo of their summer-themed decor featuring my candles on social media. Do you think that's a good idea?
